title: Global electricity consumption 1980 to 2016
yAxis: Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours
summary: Overall Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours has increased over the Year.
Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2014.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2005 and 2010.
Maximum Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours, about 20761.0 was reported at Year 2014
The lowest Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours, of value 15717.0 was reported at Year 2005
min_summary: In general Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours has rose over the Year.
Net consumption in billion kilowatt hours is slightly increasing from 2005 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2014.
